BottleInABottle:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
BottleInABottle:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

BottleInABottle:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
BottleInABottle:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
BottleInABottle:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

BottleInABottle:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
BottleInABottle:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

BottleInABottle:DefaultAttackWithVariabl.NAME: Special Strike
BottleInABottle:DefaultAttackWithVariabl.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !BottleInABottle:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

BottleInABottle:DefaultSecondMagicNumber.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
BottleInABottle:DefaultSecondMagicNumber.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !BottleInABottle:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

BottleInABottle:Paradox.NAME: Paradox
BottleInABottle:Paradox.DESCRIPTION: Soulbound, bottleinabottle:Persistent, Purge. NL If this card is in your hand at the end of your turn, loose life equal to half your current hp.
BottleInABottle:Paradox.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: *Soulbound, bottleinabottle:Persistent, Purge. NL If this card is in your hand at the end of your turn, loose life equal to half your current hp. NL (This card's cost becomes equal to the card picked for [#00bbee]Bottled[] [#00bbee]Time[].)
